item.giftwrap.name: Gift Wrap
item.giftwrap.description: It's a roll of pretty gift wrap for hiding presents.
item.wrappedgift.name: Wrapped Gift
message.giftopened: {{Recipient}} just opened a gift from {{Sender}}! It was {{ItemName}}.
message.giftopened_quantity: {{Recipient}} just opened a gift from {{Sender}}! It was {{ItemQuantity}} {{ItemName}}.
menu.infopanel.body:
Place an item in the box to wrap it up!

Leave it under another player's Winter Star tree to give them something nice to wake up to. Wrapped gifts are better for making friends in town, too!
config.availableallyear.name: Available All Year
config.availableallyear.description:
Normally, Gift Wrap is only sold from Pierre's from the day you receive
the Secret Friend gift mail until the end of Winter.
Enabling this option has Pierre sell Gift Wrap all-year round,
but it won't be at the top of his shop list outside of Winter!
config.theme.name: Theme
config.theme.description:
Changes the appearance of the gift wrap menu!
Pick your favourite colour.
